ygData.subject: Re: Necro sit in
ygData.msgSnippet: ummm My gnome Necro was KOS in Kelethin from the get go, I had to earn faction first so this might be a bad idea unless they changed the initial faction stuff
ygData.messageBody:
ummm My gnome Necro was KOS in Kelethin from the get go, I had to earn faction first so this might be a bad idea unless they changed the initial faction stuff in the last 3 months . . .

----- Original Message -----
From: Dicey
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Sent: Tuesday, November 30, 1999 10:41 AM
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Necro sit in


Someone is organizing a sit in on the Tunare server to protest Necro nerfs.
It is on Dec. 5th at Kelethin. If you dont have a Necro on Tunare, you can
create a Gnome Necro and run to Kelethin. for more info go here
http://www.doomguild.com/monitor/general/3187.html.

Dicey


------------------------------------------------------------------------
This list is basically unmoderated. However abusive language will not be tolerated
